channel.title: Dragon Claws special, help please!
channel.description: Okay when I use the special on dragon claws it will hit things like 7,8,8,8 But it will only hit the person for 15hp instead of the 31 hp that it says he was hit. It only hit's one 8 as opposed to all 3. When a number is repeated in the special it only hits once. Please help me fix this!

item.title: Dragon Claws special, help please!
item.dc:creator: @Ztink Ztink
item.description:
@Ztink wrote:

what exactly am i looking for? i am still a noob coder… And it is a deltascape base server.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws special, help please!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

You’re taking off the HP for the first two attacks, but not the second two.
Find where it does this, and check the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws special, help please!
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

u need to search ur spec methods for dclaws and change the math.floor and/or the misc.random o.O

Read full topic
